display_long_description:
**What's new? Halloween is here!**


- We've decorated the diner! Look out for cobwebs, spooky candles, new lighting and more!

- Plus Chef & co. have been dressed for the occasion!

- We've also added Halloween items for you to enjoy! Look for pumpkins to carve and spooky donuts to eat :yum:

**Other additions**

- There's a new inventory slot for you to carry an additional item!

- Pest Controller Toggle - you can now disable the Pest Controller if you'd like to with a toggle in the phone menu.

**Full details at discord.gg/raccoonvr**

```
```
```
```
Wreak havoc. Steal snacks. Be The Chaos.

:raccoon:**You are the Raccoon**

Step into the paws of a mischievous raccoon with a love for food and a knack for causing chaos.

[media]

:basketball: **Your Personal Playground**

Become the ultimate troublemaker as you sneak, scamper, and stir up chaos in a pitstop diner.

[media]

:skull_and_crossbones:**Create Maximum Mischief**

Break plates, raid the kitchen, zipline from the roof or even fry your own poop. There’s no limit to the chaos you can create. Bonus points if you make the chef rage quit.

[media]

:hamburger:**Interact with Everything**

From exploding pop cans to food guns, use anything and everything in the diner to add to the mayhem.

[media]

- Join the official Wreackin' Raccoon Discord server for community events and update info: **discord.gg/raccoonvr**

- For reporting bugs and in-game problems, please also reach out to us on Discord

- **Follow us on TikTok: @wreckinraccoon**

- Tag us in any of your chaos using **#wreckinraccoon** on social media!

Wreak havoc. Steal snacks. Be The Chaos.

:raccoon:**You are the Raccoon**

Step into the paws of a mischievous raccoon with a love for food and a knack for causing chaos.

:basketball: **Your Personal Playground**

Become the ultimate troublemaker as you sneak, scamper, and stir up chaos in a pitstop diner.

![{"height":500,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499308026_728427759657683_4422252902791331347_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=XCYKJeAlDTsQ7kNvwEK1Z4Q&_nc_oc=AdmWmcuSZu3xtcofMIRGIakA0rj6h8JTMIZlRIUGR4flilZkRtvuPhsre2y_jCNlU0I&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HcbgtpPbFWdiKgeg-MPGhg&oh=00_Aff9THvrtIbSXP7U7yCQA7XFH6eeFWsF00Q_c_lQ7aYP7A&oe=69042FBE)

:skull_and_crossbones:**Create Maximum Mischief**

Break plates, raid the kitchen, zipline from the roof or even fry your own poop. There’s no limit to the chaos you can create. Bonus points if you make the chef rage quit.

![{"height":500,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819881_2135284123666075_4284874412281472675_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=NyXKAg0hFVcQ7kNvwEy90_A&_nc_oc=AdnlMc76q38Q9APjU6yLVfbuNG72kkw5Eysn1aSx7lcNPIm7t2XEvTt5sDGh-iCPDjM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HcbgtpPbFWdiKgeg-MPGhg&oh=00_AfdhTy20cxrPa_C1Snxr8VBYLcudeV1suLeyJAZUNpHoAA&oe=6904166E)

:hamburger:**Interact with Everything**

From exploding pop cans to food guns, use anything and everything in the diner to add to the mayhem.

![{"height":500,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820019_1248959430334088_1413834264358420052_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=I1D0VYyJ-6sQ7kNvwFItIV3&_nc_oc=Adm0vaMEbqOewlh8RLkRvyYOBstQN6DN1ZR0Ymeg-4R1ZBx4grsD283zvQ83B7O4MDg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HcbgtpPbFWdiKgeg-MPGhg&oh=00_AfdovftCj5t6EpMclT7r9ol0cmYJpBTNQr2Vdux7imXkrw&oe=690405E5)
